title: Trump's Cryptocurrency Dinner Reveals Majority Foreign Buyers
summary: Over 56% of Trump's memecoin top buyers invited to a 220-person dinner were foreign nationals, raising significant ethical concerns about presidential access being sold to international investors. The top cryptocurrency holders spent $394 million to attend the event, with billionaire Justin Sun prominently featured.
description: Analysis reveals that most top cryptocurrency token holders invited to Trump's exclusive dinner are foreign nationals, highlighting potential conflicts of interest and foreign influence in presidential access.

sources.title: Trump is hosting a dinner for the biggest buyers of his memecoin. The guest list is now setâ€”and many of the winners are foreign nationals
